column2: "Na Ahab no wu ekyir no Moab tseew etua wɔ Israel do."
"Na Ahazia nam n’abansor pia a ɔwɔ Samaria n’atenatokura mu bɔhwee famu
column6: wonkebisa Ekron nyame Baal-zebub no kyerɛ dɛ mobɔbɔ esu wɔ yarba yi mu a."

column2: "Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe no see Tisbinyi Elija dɛ
column4: fow kɔ kehyia Samariahen n’abɔfoe no
column6: Ana osiandɛ Nyankopɔn bi nnyi Israel ntsi
column7: na hom rokɔ ekebisa Ekron nyame Baal-zebub no hɔ adze yi?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column3: Mpa no a afow no rimmfi do nnsian
column4: na owu ara na ibowu. Na Elija sii mu kɔree."

column2: "Na abɔfo no sanee baa ne nkyɛn
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom asan yi?"

column5: Hom nsan nkɔ ɔhen a ɔsomaa hom no nkyɛn bio
column8: Ana osiandɛ Nyankopɔn bi nnyi Israel ntsi
column9: na asoma dɛ wonkebisa Ekron nyame Baal-zebub no hɔ adze yi? Dɛm ntsi mpa no a afow no irimmfi do nnsian famu

column3: Ɔbarimba a ɔfowee bae behyiaa hom na ɔkaa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ hom no tse dɛn?"
ɔyɛ nyimpa a no ho yɛ nhwi nhwi
column4: na nwoma abɔdo bɔ n’asen. Na ɔhen no see dɛ

column2: "Nna ɔhen no somaa eduonum do safohen nye n’eduonum no wɔ no hɔ. Na ɔfowee kɔr ne nkyɛn: na
column4: ɔtse koko no n’etsifi. Na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ no

column2: "Na Elija buae see eduonum do ɔsafohen no dɛ
column3: Sɛ Nyame nyimpa nye me a
column4: ogya mfi sor nsian mbɛhyew ɔwo na w’eduonum no. Na ogya fi sor sianee bɛhyeew ɔno na n’eduonum no."

column2: "Na ɔsomaa eduonum do safohen fofor so nye n’eduonum wɔ no hɔ bio. Na obuae see no dɛ

column3: Sɛ Nyame nyimpa nye me a
column4: ogya mfi sor nsian mbɛhyew ɔwo na w’eduonum no. Na Nyame gya fi sor sianee bɛhyeew ɔno na n’eduonum no."

column2: "Na bio ɔsomaa eduonum do safohen a otsia ebiasa nye n’eduonum bio. Na eduonum do ɔsafohen a otsia ebiasa no fowee kɔree
column3: na ɔkɔkotoow n’anankoroma enyim wɔ Elija n’enyim
column9: na wo nkowaa eduonum yi hɔn nkwa nsom bo wɔ w’enyi do."

column3: ogya fi sor sianee bɛhyeew nkan no eduonum do asafohemfo beenu no nye hɔn eduonum eduonum no: na afei ma mo nkwa nsom bo wɔ w’enyi do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe no see Elija dɛ
column3: Enye no nsian nkɔ: mma nnsuro no. Na ɔsoɛree
column4: na ɔnye no sianee kɔr ɔhen no nkyɛn."
Susuampa dɛ ɔwo asoma abɔfo dɛ wonkebisa Ekron nyame Baal-zebub hɔ adze no
column5: nna siantsir nye dɛ Nyankopɔn bi nnyi Israel a wokebisa n’asɛm bi a? Dɛm ntsi mpa no a afow no irimmfi do nnsian

column2: "Nna owui dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’asɛm no a Elija kae no tse. Na osiandɛ onnyi ba ntsi
column3: Joram hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ n’ananmu wɔ Judahen Jehosafat ne ba Jehoram n’afe a otsia ebien no mu."

column2: "Afei Ahazia no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column4: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Israel ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu a?"
